name: SMS Notification Service
description: Service to broadcast SMS using Twilio as well as a concierge service.

AUTH_USERNAME.description: Username to gain access to the service.

AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Password to gain access to the service.

TWILIO_MESSAGE_SERVICE_ID.description: The SID of your Twilio Messaging service. (Activate co-pilot)

TWILIO_SENDER_ID.description: An optional sender ID for broadcast messages. Can be alpha numeric

MY_PHONE_NUMBER.description: The number that concierge SMS should be forwarded to.

TWILIO_CONCIERGE_NUMBER.description: The Twilio number you want to use for the concierge service.
